fullText: The musical may be as light as sea foam, but it floats on the charm of its star, Paul Alexander Nolan, and the good-natured pleasure of Mr. Buffett's songs.

keyPhrases.quote: The musical may be as light as sea foam, but it floats on the charm of its star.
